Baker) TR-020701 Erbil Yilmaz, Yanet Manzano, “Surveying Formal and Practical Approaches for Optimal Placement of Replicas on the Web” (student paper) Replicating content has become one of the most employed techniques to solve the currently experienced slow download time and rapidly growing demand for web contents. However the effectiveness of the solution may dramatically decrease without optimization. In this paper we survey the lately proposed solutions to optimize the placement.
